title: Dismay Our Enemies (2U17)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Response: If an Elf archer wins a skirmish, make an opponent choose a minion to discard. That opponent may remove (3) to prevent this.
Lore:	Reeling from the bite of an arrow, the Cave Troll became enraged trying to strike the nimble Elf.
Rarity:	U
